Components.BasicHybridEditor

Interface IBasicHybridEditorComp

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CBasicHybridEditorComp

    public interface IBasicHybridEditorComp
    Defines services for interacting with other components and classes ( like, Language and presentation components and NodeFactory class).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CNode getAst()
      Returns the AST associated with this hybrid editor component.
      ILanguageComp getLanguage()
      Access a Language component via its interface.
      CNodeFactory getNodeFactory()
      Returns a NodeFactory object associated with this hybrid editor.
      IPresentationComp getPresentation()
      Access a Presentation component via its interface.
      void setAst(CNode ast)
      Sets the specified AST to this hybrid editor component, and notifies its observers.
      void setLanguage(ILanguageComp language)
      Connects to a Language component via its interface.
      void setNodeFactory(CNodeFactory nodeFactory)
      Sets the NodeFactory to be used by this hybrid editor.
      void setPresentation(IPresentationComp presentation)
      Connects to a Presentation component via its interface.

    • Method Detail

      • setAst

        void setAst(CNode ast)
        Sets the specified AST to this hybrid editor component, and notifies its observers.
        Parameters:
        ast - the AST to set.

      • getAst

        CNode getAst()
        Returns the AST associated with this hybrid editor component.
        Returns:
        the AST for this hybrid editor.

      • getLanguage

        ILanguageComp getLanguage()
        Access a Language component via its interface.
        Returns:
        the Language interface

      • setLanguage

        void setLanguage(ILanguageComp language)
        Connects to a Language component via its interface. Registers for property change events, retrieves current instance of a Language object and passes its value onto its language-dependent subcomponents.
        Parameters:
        language - an instance of the Language component.

      • getNodeFactory

        CNodeFactory getNodeFactory()
        Returns a NodeFactory object associated with this hybrid editor.
        Returns:
        CNodeFactory object.

      • setNodeFactory

        void setNodeFactory(CNodeFactory nodeFactory)
        Sets the NodeFactory to be used by this hybrid editor. In addition it passes on a nodeFactory instance to CoreHybridEditor and Text2AST subcomponents.
        Parameters:
        nodeFactory - the nodefactory to be set.

      • getPresentation

        IPresentationComp getPresentation()
        Access a Presentation component via its interface.
        Returns:
        the Presentation interface

      • setPresentation

        void setPresentation(IPresentationComp presentation)
        Connects to a Presentation component via its interface. Registers for property change events, retrieves current instance of a Presentation object and passes its value onto its presentation-dependent subcomponents.
        Parameters:
        presentation - an instance of the Presentation component.
